div.div: GAME CHANGERS

div.a: The Stakes Of This Debate Cannot Be Overstated

div.div: However overhyped you think Tuesday's presidential debate is, the real cold hard truth is that it cannot be hyped enough.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RyuJy3&via=Digg&text=The Stakes Of This Debate Cannot Be Overstated

div.div: LIVE TV GONE WRONG

div.a: CNN Anchor Kills Interview Over Hate Speech On-Air

div.div: Carol Costello ends her interview with Bryan Fischer after he makes wild claims about gay involvement in the Nazi movement and the health of homosexuals.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ry60JU&via=Digg&text=CNN Anchor Kills Interview Over Hate Speech On-Air

div.div: ANATOMY OF A HOAX

div.a: How An Anonymous Blogger Tricked The Internet Into Believing He Was A Deaf Paraplegic

div.div: If there’s anything we’ve learned from the Violentacrez scandal, it’s that anonymity on the Internet can be easily unmasked–for better or worse. In the case of paraplegic Internet sensation Dave on Wheels, it was for the worse.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qnmgwy&via=Digg&text=How An Anonymous Blogger Tricked The Internet Into Believing He Was A Deaf Paraplegic

div.div: NATURAL DESTRUCTION

div.a: How Strong Can A Hurricane Get?

div.div: Category 5 on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale has no upper bound, on paper. But in theory, winds from a powerful hurricane could blow the scale out of the water, scientists say.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RyGaWo&via=Digg&text=How Strong Can A Hurricane Get?

div.div: YOU SHOULD WATCH THIS
Seriously, you should watch this.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pz5PlN&via=Digg&text=Clouds Over Cuba

div.div: WHY MESS WITH PERFECTION?

div.a: Haagen Daz Hires Design Studio To Reinvent The Ice Cream Bar

div.div: When Nipa Doshi and Jonathan Levien of London-based office Doshi Levien were approached by Haagen-Dazs about a unique collaboration, the opportunity to experiment with the frozen dessert was too sweet to resist.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SYC1yi&via=Digg&text=Haagen Daz Hires Design Studio To Reinvent The Ice Cream Bar

div.div: A SMALL PRICE TO PAY

div.a: Did Nike Pay $500K To Cover Up Armstrong's Doping?

div.div: The case against Lance Armstrong keeps getting more interesting. Did his sponsors bribe governing bodies to cover up his cheating?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SXZz6v&via=Digg&text=Did Nike Pay $500K To Cover Up Armstrong's Doping?

div.div: RANKINGS THAT MATTER
Despite numerous efforts by the government and entertainment industries, many college students still use BitTorrent to gain access to the latest movies, music and games. So who does it the most?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ToAii2&via=Digg&text=Top Colleges Ranked By Pirating

div.div: POLITICS
For a detailed explanation of how the Romney-Ryan tax plan is able to cut taxes by $5 trillion without raising taxes on the middle class or exploding the deficit, simply click on the button.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PzLi0p&via=Digg&text=DNC Unveils 'The Romney Tax Plan'

div.div: THE SCIENCE OF PUPPIES
We know something's cute when we see it, but what specific properties make us say "aww?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V0GI8r&via=Digg&text=Why Are Things Cute?

div.div: NOW YOU'RE EVEN MORE COMPLICIT

div.a: How The Foxconn Economy Manufactures Pageviews

div.div: Over the last few years, Foxconn has become a meal ticket for China Labor Watch and organizations like it. Its reports, in turn, are a page-view goldmine for a myopic media. Along the way, Foxconn has become a means for self-loathing Apple owners to flagellate themselves—and maybe even a knife the U.S. government can twist to destabilize the Chinese Communist Party.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SYAAzY&via=Digg&text=How The Foxconn Economy Manufactures Pageviews

div.div: FALSE BLACK MARKETS

div.a: Stealing The Painting Is The Easy Part

div.div: In the wake of last night's epic theft from a Dutch museum, the founder of the FBI's art crimes team explains why stealing masterpieces is a terrible business plan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ryc8lL&via=Digg&text=Stealing The Painting Is The Easy Part

div.div: COOLER THAN TIME LAPSE

div.a: A Very Unusual Camera That Emphasizes Time Over Space

div.div: The abstract-seeming images here are not the result of some wacky Photoshopping. Jay Mark Johnson’s photos are actually incredibly precise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TU1pHj&via=Digg&text=A Very Unusual Camera That Emphasizes Time Over Space

div.div: WHOA
European astronomers have discovered a planet with the mass of Earth in the Alpha Centauri star system – the nearest star system to Earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PAIWyk&via=Digg&text=Earth-Sized Planet Discovered Next Door

div.div: HOW TO DEAL WITH TROLLS

div.a: This May Be The Best Response Ever To A Facebook Rant

div.div: After a comedic rant on Bodyform Maxi Pads’ Facebook page went viral on Oct. 8, the sanitary napkins company has responded with a YouTube video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OEWF63&via=Digg&text=This May Be The Best Response Ever To A Facebook Rant

div.div: THINGS YOU HOPE YOU DIDN'T TRASH

div.a: The Hidden (And Incredibly Expensive) Relics Of Gaming's Golden Age

div.div: These are some of the rarest and most expensive video games in existence.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XdL9Q1&via=Digg&text=The Hidden (And Incredibly Expensive) Relics Of Gaming's Golden Age

div.div: WON THE EYEBALLS, MISSED THE HEARTS

div.a: How Redbull Dropped The Ball On Its Stratos Stunt

div.div: RedBull, who sponsored the jump, wasted an incredible opportunity. It had an eight million person audience captivated, but did nothing to teach that audience about the context behind Baumgartner’s jump.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PzV7LW&via=Digg&text=How Redbull Dropped The Ball On Its Stratos Stunt

div.div: WHAT'S THE OPPOSITE OF SUBLIMINAL?
A Chick-fil-A franchise in the Atlanta, Ga., area is passing out fliers for Party Trays, which may be playing on the company's brush with LGBT rights activists.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QnvtVu&via=Digg&text=New Chick-fil-A Flier Mocks 'Fruitcakes'

div.div: MALWARE

div.a: Meet MiniFlame, The Ninja Assassin Of Cyber Warfare Tools

div.div: Researchers have announced the discovery of the Flame malware’s baby cousin, MiniFlame.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVBL51&via=Digg&text=Meet MiniFlame, The Ninja Assassin Of Cyber Warfare Tools

div.div: OF COURSE IT'S SCOTTISH
At 65% ABV, Armageddon is more potent than most hard alcohol. So what's it like to drink?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsxLmO&via=Digg&text=Drinking The World's Strongest Beer

div.div: SPACE

div.a: An Interactive History Of NASA Spacesuits

div.div: Check out the gear that American astronauts have worn to work throughout history.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/a3c8sB&via=Digg&text=An Interactive History Of NASA Spacesuits
